title: It baffles me how many adults call 20 or 21 year olds teenagers
body:
Like do you guys even know what a TEEN is? I mean sure there are 20 and 21 year olds out there who are immature to the point of acting like a teen but come on now......when you know that they are at least 20....why still call them a teen?

And they say generation Y and Z and dumb. LOL....
